TopicTitle: Any mods with parts that would help me make a somewhat accurate Avro Arrow?

Articles.Content: I know for a fact that there are not many mods with a flying brick fuselage type like that of the Avro Arrow, so I would like to know if there are any addons out there that would help with such a thing. the Blue Steel mod doesn't help much, so any and all help is appreciated.

There are a few of Avro Arrow designs on Kerbal X made with stocks parts. I'm not aware of a mod for it however.  

https://kerbalx.com/HolidayTheLeek/AC-CF-105-Arrow

https://kerbalx.com/Xenome/CF-105-Avro-Arrow

https://kerbalx.com/Yukon0009/Avro-Arrow-v2
Have you tried using the Mk3-S1 (or named something similar) fuselage pieces from AirplanePlus? They are a bit more rectangular and you may get something that is a bit closer aesthetic wise.
no and i don't plan to.
